TopicTitle: Decouplers decouple then act as if they are part of the satellite

Articles.Content:
Well. I have built a rocket with 3 satellites attached. I get into my orbit and begin releasing the satellites, 1 at a time. It seems the decoupler begins to float away just a little bit, then acts as if it is part of my satellite. It happens to all 3 of them, a decoupler moves away, then stays with the sat. I turn, decoupler turns. 

This is a problem, because obviously, it shouldn't be there, but more so because it ads weight way out there and i am unable to control the satellite with thrusters on, as the weight just causes the satellite to spin.
